channel.title: So basically I'm new at this. + Ubuntu
channel.description:
I've looked around at all of these clients but because I'm using ubuntu vs Windows I haven't been able to get anything except Moparscape's Web Based Client to work. I really have no idea how to get these other clients to work because Linux doesn't use .bats to execute the files it uses Shell scripts which I don't know how to make to let these Run.
So basically if you can help me out by providing me a good RSC (or RS2) server / client running on my computer I would be appreciated. Also would like other people on it besides myself because I have no idea how to do this.
Oh yes I sound like a total noob. How fun. I just want to kill some stuff with max stats and whatever I want to wear without risk. That would be nice.
EDIT: Also there wasn't a general help place so I decided to ask here. I hope it's okay.

item.title: So basically I'm new at this. + Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

Make a new file, run.sh for example, copy the contents of the batch file in, replaces all “;” with “:”, save the file, and you’re ready to go. (sh run.sh in terminal)

Read full topic
item.source: So basically I'm new at this. + Ubuntu
